description: Complete system overview documenting the core campaign management system, gift card operations, and integration points between major components
Detailed documentation of the multi-stage reward/action triggering system, including sequential conditions, dependencies, and trigger types
Comprehensive documentation of gift card pool management, inventory tracking, provisioning strategies, and distribution logic across multiple providers
Detailed documentation of data models and relationships between campaigns, conditions, gift cards, organizations, and users including hierarchical structures
Documentation of the reward distribution algorithms, validation workflows, and integration with call center, SMS, and webhook systems
Documentation of the hierarchical permission system including role-based access control, tenant management, and permission inheritance rules
